articles.title: Western Australia to Launch First Home-Grown Satellite - OpenGov Asia
articles.description: The region is preparing to launch its first space satellite - the state-of-the-art Binar-1 CubeSat - which a team of students and engineers at Curtin University’s Space Science and Technology Centre developed.
